ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Necro Question
ygData.msgSnippet: The 20th level specializations for INT casters is what I mean. I found out the hard way and my chosen Specialty never went up. You have to put 1 point into
ygData.messageBody:
The 20th level specializations for INT casters is what
I mean. I found out the hard way and my chosen
Specialty never went up.

You have to put 1 point into Abjure Specialization,
Alteration Specialization , etc or else the one you
want , won't move.

Make sense. Just put more points into the one you
choose and make sure that is the one that hits 50
first.

Make sense?


rob
--- j s <jstrackeicg@...> wrote:
> Actually i do have a question, When you say put a
> point in to each one, i was under the impression
> that you could only specilaize in one area of
> spells. As of right now i am at 95 skill level in
> all my spell disciplines. I still have aprox. 75
> "trains" left. Thanks for taking the time to answer
> my question.
>
> Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@...> wrote:Hands down I
> would say alteration.
>
> Most of the spells you need are Alteration based.
>
> Make sure you put a point into each one else the
> numbers won't increase.
>
> also, you need to watch them closely since you want
> the one to focus on to hit 50 before any other area.
>
> Let me know if you have questions
>
> Rob
> --- jstrackeicg <jstrackeicg@...> wrote:
> > Greetings all,
> > I have a Necro who is about to hit 20 and I will
> > have to decide what
> > to specilize in. I would like to ask some of you
> > who have more
> > insite into what the future will hold for my
> necro,
> > what should I
> > specilze in?
> >
> > Thank you in advance for the great advice you
> always
> > give.
> >
> > Good luck and good hunting all.
> >
> >
> >
> >
>
>
